properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 1 at 8:55PM PST until March 3 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.


- GENERAL SEAS...6 to 8 ft tonight and Monday building to 8 to
10 ft Monday night.

- FIRST EBB...Around 930 AM Mon. Seas to 9 ft.

- SECOND EBB...Around 10 PM Mon. Seas to 10 ft.


* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...From 8 PM Monday to midnight PST Monday night.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT PST MONDAY NIGHT
